Text:
I could only get this to work with neogamma. At first i tried it with only my wii key 2 with the 1.3 disk update. The wiikey 2 update allowed me to play super mario bros wii game but not this game. After softmodding the wii using this tutorial I got it to work. Be careful in following the instructions:

At first I could not get it to install bootmii but after I got another sd card it worked.
I cannot add the link without spacing so go to u tube and look for a video called How to Hack Wii 4.2 System Menu by iComedy1.

Works great
Used USB Loader GX turned on auto patch and works perfectly
THX

P.S. Pretty fun game. Probably one of the best on Wii.

WOW, thanks for this, worked first time with the Wiikey and now my wife and girl are dancing like nutters around our front room !! 

Best game on the Wii yet !!!!

Will seed for a while....
I have the wiikwy modchip aswell...have burnt this game with imgburn 2x a couple times...even tried using Wiizle Diizle Shiizle to patch it and no luck...has anyone else had similar problems?

This game is kick-ass fun.  Anyway, yes it is PAL version but that is no prob.  I extracted ISO used ImgBurn to write to a DVDR and it worked.  All I had to do was force NTSC 480i in neogamma under Region Options.  My screen would only show in black and white and when I changed it to force video NTSC it worked perfectly.  Thanks for this.  A+++  Game 10/10
This is not USA NTSC it is PAL

If it is MULTI5, then it's obviously PAL.
Works perfectly on my NTSC-U console w/ Wiikey 2 (running through Disc Channel)
When you put USA in the title its understood that its NTSC not fucking PAL format thanks for wasting my time and others u fucking clown.
